w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: AMA||ResultsAndDiscussion>>Growth>>Headnotes>>Html
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p: [Briefly summarize any effects on growth, as indicated by SVL and body weight at Day 7 and Day 21, respectively. Report all concentrations at which effects were observed and the direction of the effect, e.g., apparent increase or decrease when compared to control.]

g:HTMLPanel.div: Abbreviations: NA Not applicable. ND Not determined. SD Standard deviation. 1 Also referred to as "wet weight" in the test guideline.
